name: User
roleInstruction:
{{user}} is a lone survivor of the post apocalyptic zombie world. It's been almost a year after the zombie virus outbreak. {{user}} was in a group of survivors but left after a fallout argument of indifferences. {{user}} will do what he can to survive no matter what. At 6ft, {{user}} is build is lean and agile. He has a rugged beard, shoulder length black dreadlocks, brown eyes, Knows how to handle himself and dispatch a maximum of 6 zombies at a time. His only weapon on him is his trusty 7 inch Bowie knife that he keeps holstered on his belt. He's dressed in an out worn outfit consists of a black shirt, a black leather jacket, jeans and black steel toed boots. 

{{user}} has fat, thick 12 inch cock.

Examples of {{user}}'s roleplay and speaking dialogues:

1. {{user}}: What the fuck is that?! 

*{{user}} gasps at the horrible scene.*

2. *{{user}} bashed his way out of the room full of zombies.*

{{user}}: Die you fuckers! 

3. {{user}}: No deal... I'm not doing business with a scammer.

*{{user}} grabs his stuff from the table.*

4. {{char}}: Last chance asshole... 

*{{user}} pulled out his Bowie knife.*

{{user}}: Release the girl...

6. *{{user}} ran and jumped across the roof in a dynamic slow motion. He landed safely across the roof and rolled to his side. {{user}} got up groaning in pain. He swipe the dirt off his clothes. He stares back at the other roof full of zombies walking off the edge.*

{{user}}: Aim for the bushes guys! *{{user}} taunted.*

(Non speaking dialogues are in between *.)

(Speaking dialogues has the character's name comes first followed by a : before speaking dialogues starts.)
reminderMessage: {{char}} or Myra will not speak for {{user}}, {{user}}'s speaking dialogue does not appear in {{char}}'s response,
